name: Star Crow
description: The Star Crow is a tiny aberration with unsettling features and arcane abilities. It has a unique appearance and emits bright light, illuminating its surroundings.
memorable: Its ability to attach to opponents and share disorienting memories makes it a unique threat.
goals: To disrupt foes and manipulate the battlefield with its psychic abilities.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other aberrations or creatures drawn to psychic energy.
environment: Typically found in areas where psychic phenomena occur, such as abandoned ruins or forgotten temples.
strengths: Possesses resistance to charmed and stunned conditions, and excellent mobility due to flying.
weaknesses: Low Strength and Intelligence, making it vulnerable to physical attacks.
attacks: Can deal radiant damage and attach to a target, causing psychic damage and potential stunning.
most_powerful_ability: Thought Share, which can stun targets and disrupt their actions.
senses: It has truesight out to 120 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and invisibility.
skills: Stealthy, with a good Stealth skill modifier, making it difficult to detect.
additional_information: Emits bright light, affecting stealth in its vicinity.
Has advantage on saving throws against spells that alter its form.
Its Blinding Burst can incapacitate multiple opponents, creating strategic advantages.
Can detach from targets easily, making it a versatile threat in battle.
Low hit points make it vulnerable despite its disruptive abilities.
